TEXT.TITLE: TRANSCAPITAL <TFC> UNIT CLOSING 12 OFFICES
TEXT.BODY: TransCapital Financial Corp's TRANSOHIO Savings Bank subsidiary said it plans to close 11 offices in the Cleveland area and one in Columbus, Ohio, reducing its total number of offices to 81 statewide. The company said accounts will be moved into other TRANSOHIO offices. Four closings are set for May 23 and four for June 20 and the rest are tentatively set for September 19. It said it is closing branches were overlaps exist following its August 1986 acquisitions of Citizens Federal Savings and Loan Association of Cleveland and Dollar Savings Bank of Columbus or where efficiencies could be improved. Reuter
